definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.english: We also offer wheelchair and walking stick. Please contact the Luggage Room if you need.
sentences.chinese: 饭店备有轮椅车和拐杖，如需使用请与行李房联系。

sentences.english: Reads all memos concerning Bell Service.
sentences.chinese: 阅读与行李房有关的所有通知。

sentences.english: You have to go to the luggage office .
I'll get in touch with the Bell Captain at once.
sentences.chinese: 我会马上与行李房取得联系。

sentences.english: Take your baggage to the baggage section.
sentences.chinese: 把你的行李拿到行李房去。

sentences.english: You may take it to the luggage room.
sentences.chinese: 您可把皮箱送到行李房去。

sentences.english: Check the cleanliness and tidiness of luggage storage room and concierge service counter.
sentences.chinese: 检查行李房和礼宾部柜台是否干净整洁。

sentences.english: I checked my baggage in the baggage section。

definition: to inspect a ticket/to examine a ballot
